definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: : Ge 22:13 ram (as leader of flock, NHeb. & Aram. id., As. ailu Dl:W, Ph. [[איל]], = [[אַיִל]] rather than [[אַיׇּל]], cf. CIS:l. p. 231)—[[אַיִל]] ([[אָָיִל]]) Ge 15:9 +; cstr. [[אֵיל]] Ex 29:22 +; pl. [[אֵילִים]] ([[אֵילִם]], [[אֵלִים]]) Ge 32:15 +; cstr. [[אֵילֵי]] Ge 31:38, Is 60:7.—ram,

used as food Ge 31:38 (E) De 32:14 (cf. ram of sacrifice, infr. e.g. Ex 29:32 cf. Le 8:31); as yielding wool 2Ki 3:4; as tribute 2Ch 17:11; as merchandise Ez Eze 27:21; as gift Ge 32:15 (E); in sim. of leaping, skipping Ps 114:4 (´[[הֶהָרִים רָקְדוּ כְּא]]) v:Ps 114:6; in Dn.'s vision, ram with two horns symbol. kings of Media and Persia Da 8:3, Da 8:4, Da 8:6, Da 8:7, Da 8:7, Da 8:7, Da 8:7, Da 8:20; fig. of rich and powerful in Isr. Ez Eze 34:17.

slain in ceremony of ratification of convenant betw. ´[[י]] & Abr. Ge 15:9 (J); in Abr.'s sacrif. Ge 22:13, Ge 22:13 (E); Balaam's sacrif. Nu 23:1 + 5 t. Nu 23 (JE); so in ritual (P), (a) in consecration ceremony of Aaron & his sons Ex 29:1 + 15 t. Ex 29 (´[[א]] [[מִלֻּאִים]] v:Ex 29:22 cf. v:Ex 29:26, v:Ex 29:27, v:Ex 29:31) Le 8:2 + 8 t. Le 8 ([[הַמִּלֻּאִים]] ´[[א]] v:Le 8:22, v:Le 8:29 [[הָעׂלָה]] ´[[א]] v:Le 8:18); (b) in guilt-offering ([[אָשָׁם]]) Le 5:15, Le 5:16, Le 5:18, Le 5:25, Le 19:21, Le 19:22 cf. Ezr 10:19 & [[הַכִּפֻּרִים]] ´[[א]] Nu 5:8; (c) burnt-offering ([[עׂלָה]]) Le 9:2 & Nu 15:6, Nu 15:11 & Ez Eze 46:4, Eze 46:5, Eze 46:6, Eze 46:7, Eze 46:11, on day of atonement Le 16:3, Le 16:5, Pentecost Le 23:18; (d) peace-offering ([[שְׁלָמִים]]) Le 9:4, Le 9:18, Le 9:19; beginning of month Nu 28:11, Nu 28:12, Nu 28:14 cf. Nu 29:2, Nu 29:3; passover v:Nu 29:19; v:Nu 29:20 cf. Ez Eze 45:23, Eze 45:24; day of firstfruits v:Nu 29:27; v:Nu 29:28; in 7th month Nu 29:8 + 18 t. Nu 29; (e) in law of Nazarite Nu 6:14, Nu 6:17, Nu 6:19; (f) in consecration of altar of tabernacle Nu 7:15 + 25 t. Nu:Nu 7, cf. consecr. of Ezek.'s temple-altar Ez Eze 43:23, Eze 43:25; (g) more generally 1Sa 15:22, Is 1:11, Mic 6:7, Job 42:8, Ps 66:15, also Is 34:6, Is 60:7; at bringing ark to Jerus. 1Ch 15:26; others occasions 1Ch 29:21, 2Ch 13:9, 2Ch 29:21, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:32, Ezr 8:35; cf. fig. Je 51:40, Ez Eze 39:18.
[[עׂרׂת אֵילִים מְאָדָּמִים]] rams’ skins dyed red, of covering of tabernacle Ex 25:5, Ex 26:14, Ex 35:7, Ex 35:23, Ex 36:19 cf. Ex 39:34 (all P).
